mapper.select: SELECT FREEBOARD_NUM, FREEBOARD_COMMENT_NUM, FREEBOARD_COMMENT_CONTENT, FREEBOARD_COMMENT_REGDATE,FREEBOARD_ID FROM FREEBOARD_COMMENT WHERE FREEBOARD_NUM = (SELECT FREEBOARD_NUM FROM FREEBOARD WHERE FREEBOARD_NUM = #{freeboard_num}) ORDER BY FREEBOARD_COMMENT_NUM
mapper.update: UPDATE FREEBOARD_COMMENT SET FREEBOARD_COMMENT_CONTENT = #{freeboard_comment_content} WHERE FREEBOARD_COMMENT_NUM = #{freeboard_comment_num}
